sec.title: Failure of the power supply
sec.p: An interruption of the power supply and a re-establishment after an interruption shall not lead to a dangerous situation, in particular:

list-item.label: a)
list-item.p: it shall only be possible to restart a rig by an intentional action;

list-item.label: b)
list-item.p: the rig shall not be prevented from stopping if the stop command has been given;

list-item.label: c)
list-item.p: no part of the machine or a tool shall fall or be ejected;

list-item.label: d)
list-item.p: stopping, automatic or manual, of moving parts shall operate without undue delay;

list-item.label: e)
list-item.p: guards and other protective devices shall remain effective.

sec.p: A power failure or a hydraulic or pneumatic pressure drop shall not cause any dangerous movements or actions. Such failures shall not prevent the emergency stop systems from functioning.
